name: Into Jhonny's Mind
description:
This is a game for Mini jam 111 game jam!

Into Jhonny's Mind is my first ever big game project, so it is petty bad, but if you have fun playing it I'm happy enough.

The limitation of Mini jam 111 is in the plot, but unfortunately I did not have enough time to improve it. The game don't even have half the amount of cutscenes that I wanted to make, sorry for this guys

The game don't have audio because I don't know how to do them, I started Gamedev early this mouth so if you have any suggestions on how to improve in gamedev, I would aprreciate much if you put it in the comments!

btw i from brazil so my english is not that great
